An iPhone Microscope to Help Eradicate River Blindness

iPhone camera and microscope lenses is sure not an apple to apple comparison but when you trap in the middle of sub-Saharan Africa, you can use you iPhone to help diagnose people with Loa-loa, an eyeworm which causes river blindness.

Jun 29, 2015
